name: Samsung 50 Inches AU7000 Crystal UHD 4K Flat Smart TV (2021), Titan Gray, UA50AU7000UXZN
full_description: Movies, sports, games and more. This TV was designed to elevate your screen viewing experience with crystal clear picture and exemplary colour spectrum. The ultra-sleek design is minimal elegance that packs in some powerful technology. The Crystal Processor 4K drives all-around performance; enhancing colour, contrast, brightness and more to deliver a picture that's incredibly sharp and crystal clear. The AirSlim design features an ultra-thin profile, allowing your TV to blend effortlessly with your interior for a minimalist look. Enhance the minimalist interior design look with the easy-to-install Slim Fit Wall Mount, your TV fits snug to the wall to help it blend naturally into your space. Further eliminate clutter with our Clean Cable Solution that will keep your cables tidy and conceal them, for that seamless you want. The AU7000 promises Lifelike colour that's vibrant and bold. Dynamic Crystal Color delivers lifelike variations so you can see every subtlety and immerse yourself in the picture. High Dynamic Range allows you to see dark and light in every scene. It increases the range of light levels on your TV so you can enjoy an enormous spectrum of colours and all the visual details, in even the darkest scenes. If you love the picture, wait till you hear this. Object Tracking Sound Lite provides vividly realistic 3D sound that pulls you in closer. The virtual top channel audio will allow you to be fully immersed in the audio experience. Watch what's on your TV and your mobile on the same screen at the same time. Whether it's live stats for sports or cheat videos for games, simply connect your phone and multi-screen like never before. Samsung's seamless connectivity means you can connect your PC, laptop and mobile with voice assistance powered by Bixby. This is not just a TV, it's the ultimate viewing experience. The AU7000 Crystal UHD 4K Smart TV comes in five sizes: 43",50'',55'', 58", 65", 75" and 85".
